VAR - CLEARANCE LEVEL.description: string - description of access level e.g. moderator/admin/executives

management.access-tier: number - access level of the executive
management.description: string - description of the access level

TRANSACTIONID.user: string - UID of user of operation
TRANSACTIONID.user_name: string - name of user of operation
TRANSACTIONID.amount: number - amount of money used on operation

UID.name: string - real name
UID.course: string - abbreviated course name e.g. MH, EE, BI

TRANSACTIONID.exec: string - UID of exec in charge
TRANSACTIONID.exec_name: string - name of exec in charge
TRANSACTIONID.amount: number - amount of money used on operation
